long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Want to make your googling experience more cooler? Check out Xoogley.

Not only does it change how Google looks but it replaces all your new tabs with a slick Xoogley background and quick access to your most popular sites.

This is only the first version of the app. Our goal is to allow the user to customise their browsing and searching experience.
